name: cvplus
description: CVPlus - AI-Powered CV Transformation Platform - Monorepo

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:i18n && npm run build:auth && npm run build:cv-processing && npm run build:multimedia && npm run build:premium && npm run build:recommendations && npm run build:public-profiles && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:functions
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=frontend && npm run lint --workspace=@cvplus/core && npm run lint --workspace=@cvplus/i18n && npm run lint --workspace=@cvplus/auth && npm run lint --workspace=@cvplus/cv-processing && npm run lint --workspace=@cvplus/multimedia && npm run lint --workspace=@cvplus/premium && npm run lint --workspace=@cvplus/recommendations && npm run lint --workspace=@cvplus/public-profiles
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=frontend && npm run type-check --workspace=@cvplus/core && npm run type-check --workspace=@cvplus/i18n && npm run type-check --workspace=@cvplus/auth && npm run type-check --workspace=@cvplus/cv-processing && npm run type-check --workspace=@cvplus/multimedia && npm run type-check --workspace=@cvplus/premium && npm run type-check --workspace=@cvplus/recommendations && npm run type-check --workspace=@cvplus/public-profiles
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=frontend && npm run test --workspace=functions && npm run test --workspace=@cvplus/core && npm run test --workspace=@cvplus/i18n && npm run test --workspace=@cvplus/auth && npm run test --workspace=@cvplus/cv-processing && npm run test --workspace=@cvplus/multimedia && npm run test --workspace=@cvplus/premium && npm run test --workspace=@cvplus/recommendations && npm run test --workspace=@cvplus/public-profiles
